skill.name: grammar-style-enhancer
skill.description: Analyzes prose for grammar errors, style inconsistencies, clarity issues, and readability problems. Provides specific suggestions for improvement while preserving the author's unique voice. Use when the user needs help polishing their writing, improving clarity, or maintaining consistent style.
skill.summary: Analyzes prose for grammar errors, style inconsistencies, clarity issues, and readability problems. ...

security_audit.summary: All 48 static findings are false positives. The scanner flagged technical terms (crypto, network) in documentation and Markdown code formatting (backticks) as security issues. This is a pure text analysis skill with no network calls, no command execution, and no file I/O operations.

content.value_statement: Poor grammar and inconsistent style undermine credibility and clarity in written communication. This skill analyzes text to identify errors, improve readability, and polish writing while preserving the author's unique voice.
actual_capabilities: Detects grammar errors including subject-verb agreement, tense consistency, and punctuation mistakes
Identifies style inconsistencies such as varying sentence structures and tonal shifts
Evaluates text clarity and suggests improvements for complex or ambiguous passages
Analyzes readability metrics and recommends adjustments for target audiences
limitations: Does not fact-check or verify the accuracy of content claims
Cannot detect plagiarism or copyright issues in text
Limited support for specialized technical jargon or domain-specific terminology
Does not provide real-time writing suggestions during composition

use_cases.title: Professional Document Review
use_cases.description: Writers and professionals polish reports, emails, and proposals before submission to ensure error-free, polished communication.

use_cases.title: Academic Paper Editing
use_cases.description: Students and researchers improve the clarity and professionalism of academic papers, theses, and research articles.

use_cases.title: Content Creation Enhancement
use_cases.description: Bloggers and content creators refine their writing to engage readers with clear, consistent, and professional prose.

faq.question: What types of grammar errors does this skill detect?
faq.answer: It detects common errors including subject-verb agreement, verb tense consistency, article usage, pronoun reference, sentence fragments, and run-on sentences.

faq.question: Does this skill work with non-English text?
faq.answer: This skill is optimized for English text. Limited support may be available for other languages, but accuracy will vary.

faq.question: How does this skill differ from spell-checkers?
faq.answer: Spell-checkers identify misspelled words. This skill analyzes grammar, sentence structure, style, clarity, and readability at a deeper level.

faq.question: Can I use this skill for academic papers?
faq.answer: Yes. It helps ensure professional writing standards, but it does not verify factual claims or academic formatting requirements.

faq.question: Does this skill store or share my text?
faq.answer: No. This skill processes text locally for analysis without storing or transmitting your content to external services.

faq.question: What is the recommended text length for analysis?
faq.answer: Best results come from complete paragraphs or sections. Very long documents may need to be analyzed in smaller chunks.
